content.detailedDescription: I was fishing at night by myself on the dan river. it was about 2am when i saw a blue light coming down the river bottom on the same path as the rr tracks. at first i tought it was the train then realized there was no sound. the light followed the rr until it reached the edge of the river. the orb was in plain view for about a min. it looked to be about 10 ft. in diameter and glowed a bright blue. it suddenly shot straight up at a unbelievable rate of speed and was gone. i got my fishing gear together and went home.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orb followed rr tracks until it came to the river. hovered for about a minite then went straight up at a high rate of speed..

content.detailedDescription: I was dispatched to an oil-rig near carlsbad nm and approx 10 pm at night i noticed an object getting brighter and brighter getting lower approx 1/2 mile dropping to 3-500ft a disc shape object with a blue white light dome on top of it appeared in front of my path,  hovering over oil-rig , i thought it was a helicopter , but no noise , i turned my truck off and grabbed my cell phone and immediately started taking pics and upon reviewing pics i could clearly see a ufo like i was seeing with my own eyes , the object stayed over rig for approx 3-4 mins then disappeared with in a flash and was gone ..  most beautiful but frightening experience at same time, all i could think about was hurrying up and getting to rig to be with others so nothing happened to me , a few others seen this as well as we spoke it for 2-4 days then dropped it bcuz we thought we were going to be investigated by men in black , so we made a pack to never to discuss this again.. approx 4 months later during day time a bright object came back to another rig same height no noise couldn't believe what i was seeing ,this was scary stuff this object was so bright i really thought someone was going to get on abducted .. everyone seen this time this object and after i snapped a pic with my phone this object was gone in a blind of an eye ... can't believe 2 ufos in 4 months.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Sighting going to oil rig near carlsbad nm

content.detailedDescription:
I happened to glance out my window and saw the object moving in the sky. by the time i'd grabbed my camera and changed the lens to the longest i had, it had gone out of view from my window. 
i stepped out the patio door and took the pictures included with this report - the first picture taken was at 16:09:41, the last at 16:10:34 (please note: on board camera time was 2 hours fast so meta data shows 18:09 instead of 16:09)

my first thought was that it was a comet or meteor - but i've since been told that it is too big for a meteor and probably not been seen and  "comets too are eliminated because (1) few comets are brilliant enough to be visible in daylight, (2) comets move at astronomical speeds and distances which results in them appearing as fixed in the sky as the moon if not more so"

the object was moving steadily in a southerly direction (probably closer to 170 degrees than 180)it never turned or twisted.

i've since tried to find out what i saw but have seen no other reported sightings.

it eventually disappeared from view below the horizon. 


(last 2 photos are crops of pic 3 and pic 7 respectively)
content.summary: Observed from house travelling across sky grabbed camera and photographed it

content.detailedDescription: I was on a vaporetto boat in venice italy when my eye caught this strange object crossing the rainy sky that at one point it just vanished. it was flashing going quite fast on a straight line. after 13 seconds my phone died and a few seconds later the object just disappeared.
content.summary: Orbe - spher - multi colur - flying object

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard with a friend sitting around a small fire. i cannot explain why, but i felt the presence of something, which greatly disturbed me, so i halted the conversation and immediately looked up and saw what, to me, appeared to be a boeing type aircraft above, and around 3 seconds after seeing the aircraft, i saw the orb like object approximately a quarter of a mile to the left side of the airplane, and at that point, i had my friend attempt to capture a video on his iphone, however, although we could see the object and the airplane, the phone wouldn't capture anything at all except stars. after instantaneously realizing that this was highly unusual, i couldn't help but watch this event unfold. their flight paths were perfectly parallel to one another, and the object was traveling at a slightly faster speed than the airplane. after about 20 seconds, another airplane, with similar size, lights, and airspeed entered the area from the southwest traveling towards the other airplane. when the two planes appeared to be closing in on the orb, it stopped for about 4 seconds, then, it reversed its course and darted off in the exact direction from which it came with speed resembling a shooting star, and it was gone. immediately, one of the planes changed course and followed the last visible direction of the object, and for about a full hour, both planes remained in the area, flying in a triangular pattern in the airspace over and around my home. then they left, one at a time, and the event from a visual standpoint, was over, however, the uneasy feeling did not leave me until around 1:00 a.M. at which time, i laid down and went to sleep.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing yellow-orenge orb craft maintained a steady course. stopped. then rapidly reversed direction

content.detailedDescription:
Stepping outside to check out a noise i looked to my right and observed a the huge formation east of spokane valley, wa where i live.  my view from my apartment was obstructed by a ridge line and trees so i got in my car and drove over the ridge to a clearing about 2 miles away for a better view.

i observed a huge formation of lights surrounded by blackness in the sky, no other lights or stars were visable at the time.  in the middle of all of this i observed a grouping of at least 9 light golden colored lights.  during my 30 minutes of observation the whole formation was slowly moving south from the point i originally first observed the mass.

while observing i did spot a plane flying west in the direction of fairchild air force base.  after the plane cleared my vision i noticed one of the "stars" leave its stationary position and travel in the what appeared to be the same path as the plane.

geeze what a sighting!
content.summary: Large mass sighting moving south along the rockies / id/wa state line

content.detailedDescription:
This was august, summer of 1977.  it was about 9 o’clock at night.  it was not totally dark.  where we lived on long island was close to the flight path of jfk, so we were used to seeing planes fly high overhead our house.  we lived in a somewhat rural area, on 2 acres of land, surrounded by trees, with neighbors on either side.  it was after dinner, and i went outside with my older brother, who was 20 and going to college at dartmouth, his girlfriend, my younger sister who was 16, and our cousin, who was 14 or 15.  it was a beautiful night and my sister tina was the first to notice 3 odd lights in the sky beyond our back fence.  these lights were in a triangle formation, they were low in the sky, and brighter than the stars in the sky.  and they seemed to be coming right towards us.  we didn't think they were planes, since they were so low, so at first we thought they might be helicopters.  they were moving side to side in unison, and we couldn’t hear any noise.  at this point we just stood there and watched these lights, trying to figure out what they were.  then, somehow, two of the lights just blinked out, but one of them kept approaching us, moving slow and steady.  as it got closer, the light was getting brighter and bigger and it started to appear like an object.  this is when we first thought that we might be seeing a flying saucer.  because it didn’t have any wings, it was completely silent, and it was moving very slowly and deliberately.  soon, we all became convinced that we were being approached by a classic saucer shaped ufo.  we were scared and mesmerized at the same time.  at this point, my brother told us that he wanted to run to the house to get his glasses so he could see it better.  and he ran back to the house and left the four of us there in the backyard.  in the minute and a half that he was gone, this craft came right over our neighbor’s yard, slowly and silently, and then stopped right next to us at tree top level over our neighbor’s back yard.  the disc was about 60 feet in diameter, probably about 100 feet over the ground, and approximately 150 feet away from us.  it was a classic silver saucer shape.  the surface looked metallic silver, almost like brushed metal, and it had a dome on the bottom, and it had a light right in the center of this dome, i think it might have been blue.  there were red, green and blue lights moving around the perimeter of the saucer in a pattern.  i didn’t see any windows or openings.  and i couldn’t see the top of the ufo because it was almost directly above us.  it sat there above us completely still, silent and not moving.  at this point, we were all scared and paralyzed with fear.  we were all holding each other as tightly as we could, and i remember trying not to breathe or make noise, because i was afraid that the ufo might notice us and focus its attention on us.  i didn’t know what might happen, but i was definitely afraid of being taken away.  then all of a sudden, out of the bottom center of the ufo, a bright white cone of light appeared and hit our neighbor’s yard.  it was so bright that i couldn’t see anything past the light, and the grass it was illuminating appeared to be white.  now i was physically shaking and afraid that the light was going to sweep towards us, but i had no idea what might happen.  then all of a sudden, the white light beneath the ufo went out and in almost an instant, the ufo banked and zipped over our neighbor’s roof until it was a pinpoint in the sky, literally in just a split second.  as it left, it was the only time the ufo made any noise, as a heard a very faint, high pitched whirring noise, similar to the noise that an old fashioned top made when you pulled the string hard to get it spinning.

after the ufo left, we all ran screaming towards the house, and met up with my brother who was running back outside.  he asked us where the ufo was, and we were jumping up and down and talking all at once, describing what we had just witnessed.

we then ran inside the house to tell my parents and some friends they had over.  but when we told them we saw a ufo, they all laughed at us and dismissed it as if we had just told them funny joke.  at that moment, something inside me hardened, and i think i instantly realized that no one would ever believe what i had just seen.  what’s even stranger, is that after that night i never discussed the ufo with my brother, sister or cousin for about 30 years.  and i didn’t tell anyone about it until i told a girlfriend 4 years later. 

for the next 30 years i only told 5 or 6 of my closest friends about the encounter.  but i made sure that they knew me very well, and i usually prefaced my story by saying, “promise me you won’t judge me and differently after i tell you this story.”

about 7 years ago, i got up the nerve to ask my sister if she remembered seeing the ufo.  i was relieved when said yes, and i asked her to describe it to me.  she remembered the same details that i did.  next i called my brother to ask him what he remembered, but he reminded me that he missed the close encounter because he was in the house getting his glasses.  i then called my cousin, but he just remembered that something incredible had happened, but he didn’t remember seeing the ufo, although he did remember something that had to do with a bright light.  last, i asked my brother to locate his old girlfriend and find her.  he hadn’t spoken to her in over 30 years, but he did email her, and she responded that she also remembered something strange happened that night, but she didn’t remember seeing the ufo either, but distinctly remembered seeing a bright white light that night.

i was a little disappointed that only my sister and i vividly remembered all the details of that evening, but my cousin’s and my brother's girlfriend's recollections convinced me that we had all witnessed something unusual that night.  and since then, i have heard that it’s not unusual for some ufo witnesses to not be able to recall all the details of their encounter.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo hovered over my neighbor's yard and stopped at tree top level about a 150' from me.

content.detailedDescription:
Observed a bright blue glowing object approx 30 degrees above, to start, of horizon. started video taping as soon as i noticed while leaving my office walking to my car. object began to pulse and i was facing due north at the time. object began to descend slow then move to the east. object then hovered and appeared to rapidly change form to a chevron type form and darted west. object continued strange east to west movement rapidly accelerating at some differing points. including darting up and down. continued to video and observe for approx 5-10 mins. object was very difficult to videotape for some reason even at full zoom on iphone. actually even got in car and drove a little further north to see if video would be better if i got around this tree. then tried to get more video. i had to move car and leave because i was actually causing a rush hour traffic issue. i live and work under the dulles flight path and there were multiple airliners in the sky also. i am also a trained observer and have knowledge of most foreign and domestic aircraft including soar craft and lighter then air. this was neither. my inclination was a personal uav that was a hoax, or a govt  model. but in this area that is a very risky hoax! but this did not strike me as a drone and i pretty familiar w gov models also!
i ended up driving away to go home and lost sight of the object. 
fiance and i discussed what we saw and i placed a call to ffx co emergecy ops center to see if anyone else had sen or reported. dispatcher checked in w other units in area and at that said no other reports as of yet and they confirmed they had no helicopters in area either. they then referred me to non emerg faa number but instead we are sending to you. we have  approx 10 minutes total of video that fiancé and i trying to figure which video to send and how to upload. 
thank you for your time in advance.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Bright blue white object easily seen by eye at a distance of approx 1/4 to the eye mi at 25/30 * above horizon. change rapid direction multiple times and hovered silently flashed bright blue.

content.detailedDescription: I was out having a cigarette, and i walked towards the back of the yard because i heard a sound. it must have been a cat or something, but it ran by me and seemed pretty shook up. it scared the heck out of me. not long after that, i looked across the field behind my house and saw a huge explosion with a bright light in the middle of it. it was pretty far away, but it lit up the whole sky. i didn't hear a single sound, and i thought that was extremely odd. there isn't a cloud in the sky, so i don't believe it was lightning. i was outside for roughly 10 minutes, and after the first flash that i witnessed the sky lit up two more times, but i wasn't able to see any kind of flash or explosion from those, it seemed like they came from separate directions. i thought the explosion must have been some kind of firework or house fire, but there was no sound and it was gone in about a second. it made me feel pretty uneasy, and i thought i'd send a report to see if anyone saw the same thing.
content.summary: Odd flashes in the sky with no sound

content.detailedDescription:
On friday 12th december i was driving from stoke on trent to derbyshire.


after passing through uttoxeter i was heading past rocester when i noticed 2 strange lights in the sky.

they were as bright as the planet venus, one was situated close to but higher in the sky than the moon, the other was further back, i later noticed a third object.

these were not like stars.  they were like more akin to a floating cylinder but slightly on their side like " \ "

i stopped the car several times along the route to look because they seemed to be changing shape.

there was no movement other than this shape changing / rotating.

i could not ascertain how close they were i'd say they were possibly outside the earth' atmosphere.  

my first though was that the brightest would be the iss, but there was another bright one too could that be the chinese space station?

i took lots of snaps on my iphone and a couple of short videos. the videos don't really show much though.

after passing through ashbourne, i stopped at the bentley brook inn. there were 2 senior citizen in a car, i asked them if they could see the lights and if they looked odd to them.  they seemed non committal, and kept saying they were probably satellites, but i have seen many satellites and satellites are mot that bright and move across the sky.

i could see the objects all the way from rocester, to darley dale. 
where i got my fuji finepix s 5000 out and took some more snaps, interestingly enough when i put those pics on the computer the object nearest the moon (the only one i could get a proper pic of), had some interesting texture/pattern.

i don't know what these objects were. i have however seen 3 similar objects on beely moor, a few weeks ago,  travelling back from chesterfield, recently. the objects over the moor were much lower and had flashing lights. again they looked like tubes on their sides like a "/" or "\".

i have more photos than i can upload here.
content.summary: 3 strange lights like a slash of light stationary

content.detailedDescription: My wife saw it first,she said there's a funny light in the sky, as i got up to look at it, i noticed it wasn't an air craft,it was like a star but far away,i grabbed my 35 mm camera took video and photos,but i had to bring out the zoom lens all the way. one photo looks like 2 soup bowls inverted on each other,with a thin space between them with rings around the object. i took several pics,but 4 of them are very strange. i also got video of it showing all its colors.I watched it for 30 minutes or so, then i went to bed. i did make prints of it. nobody can figure it out.
content.summary: Very fast multi colored lights, very bright. didnt move.M

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving from work through grafarvogur when it shot down. 
2. just coincidence.
3. i had no idea, first idea was a firework but then i remembered it randomly appeared from the sky and went downwards. plus, no sound or bright "boom" afterwards.
4. a clear and bright, green light shot from the sky and headed downwards. it suddenly appeared and then vanished very quickly afterwards.
5. i headed towards the light instead of going home, tried to find any sign of what it was. found nothing.
6. it just disappeared quickly after it appeared.
content.summary: Green fireball shot horizontally downwards above town, short duration but bright and clear. like firework coming down from nowhere down from sky.

content.detailedDescription:
We recently bought a place in the fort hill area. 
we first noticed after about 30 days of living here that we suddenly have a perfect circle that stays fresh green, no matter what weather, in our front yard.  friday night (the 12th) we were driving home and after turning on carmel rd which leads to our road (washburn) we went around the curve by the carmel church and then up a small incline and approx. 10 feet over the incline and in front of our truck, the alien ran across the rd and into the woods.  my husband saw it.  he is a skeptic, almost 60 years old and a proud marine.  he wouldn't have admitted to seeing it if he hadn't been in shock.  i had him draw it for me when we got to the house.  he says it was asphalt gray (our asphalt is gray) and about 7 foot tall, no arms that he could see, but muscular in the legs area. no jawline and it's legs were bent backward and it leaned forward as it ran.
content.summary: Coming home, just over a small incline and it ran across the road in front of our truck, into the woods.

content.detailedDescription: There were a lot of airplanes flying that evening before i saw the ufo. i was on mableton pkwy around 10:15pm driving home and there was an aircraft that seemed brighter and more different than the airplanes. i didn't really think much of it beyond that. i turned onto south gordon and got to the corner of s gordon & factory shoals and stopped at the light. something told me to look up - so i looked out my window and i saw the brightly lit aircraft hovering motionless and soundless just a few feet above me. the aircraft was in the shape of a triangle - it had 6 to 10 triangle-shaped lights on the bottom surface as i looked up(can't really remember the exact count). the lights were lined up the same way you would rack the balls when playing billiards/pool and took on the shape of the aircraft. i did receive a telepathic message stating they were the galactic federation of light but i did not see any et beings - only the ship. the ship flew off as fast as it came - it did not make any sound and it seemed like i looked down for half a second and they were gone... i didn't see any trace of them when i looked back up.

I was driving on a elevated highway and saw 4-5 glowing orange lights in the sky that were in a formation with a helicopter hovering around nearby only when i exited the highway is when i lost view of them. honestly i thought they were stars but they were bigger, orangish (fire color) and in a very obvious line formation.....And i also spoke to someone on facebook who confirmed the same thing...They thought they were seeing the gemini meteor shower but a day later.They also saw one go shooting down.
content.summary: I was driving on a elevated

content.detailedDescription:
Second sight of a strange object. first i was looking at a bright spot, asking myslef if it was a star or a plane. after remaining on point for two thee minutes it suddenly started to move remarkably. so i took my camera and tried to capture what i saw and maybe get a closer look through a zoom. i managed to take some pictures before it dashed away and dissapeared. in some pictures i included the moon as a reference and one of this pictures gives a very nice shaped object. if it would not have been moving that strange i would say it looks like an early stage of the iss.
please find the small white spot in the dark image and enlarge it yourself.
content.summary: First hovering, then dashing away.

content.detailedDescription: My 5 yr old daughter wanted to look at stars in my driveway that night. i pointed out constellations, and then saw what i initially thought was a hawk coasting towards our house. i say hawk because it was high enough to be a bird of prey, but low enough to be below any fly zone of aircraft.  it looked brown/copper with a triangular wing shape at first, which i thought were the street lights reflecting off of brown hawk wings.  it looked like it was about 150-200 ft in the air. hard to tell exactly.  it was completely silent.  i pointed it out to my daughter and we both watched it cruise over our house directly overhead.  as it got closer i saw that the triangular brown tint of the wings was actually very dull copper colored lights in symmetrical fashion and equidistant from each other. also, in addition to the triangular pattern of dull lights, there was an additional single light extending off to the right of it (about 2 to 3 times the width of the base of the triangle away from it).  i got the impression that there was a triangle flying with a single arm branching off of it with a single light. it came at a constant speed and the "arm" was in constant distance/speed as the body of the craft as if it were connected.  it passed directly over us at a constant and silent speed (at about the speed of a coasting hawk) and we watched it pass over our house and continue on into the distance.  it did not ever increase elevation, but stayed at a consistent altitude.  it was definitely consisting of very dull copper lights in the shape of a triangle.  my 5 yr old daughter and i both watched it and were in awe.  we didn't speak much of it as we went inside.  but a week later she was drawing a picture with crayons and when i asked her what it was, she told me it was the space ship we saw that night.  to my shock, she had drawn exactly what i thought i saw.  a triangle with lights and a long arm sticking out to my right with a single light.  i took a picture of her drawing for future reference.  since then, i have gone outside to look at the sky and have seen nothing.  the picture she drew is in my phone, which i don't know how to upload to this page.  but if someone really wants to know and has reason to pursue it, i guess i don't mind going to some effort and emailing you the drawing.
content.summary: I thought it was a hawk at night at first. silent. coasting. saw dull lights with extended arm when overhead. 5 yr old saw too and drew picture.

content.detailedDescription: Several, perhaps eight orange glowing objects moved over seattle one after another over about fifteen minutes east to west. they were not luminaria, chinese candle lantern balloons. they turned their lights on and off and performed maneuvers in the air and were moving too fast to be luminaria and luminaria cannot of course perform maneuvers. i called my friend to have him go out and take a look and he said one was doing loops in the sky. i didn't see that but i did see them move under control, changing direction and or altitude, hard to say. meanwhile there was a pulsating white light directly south of downtown seattle which was perfectly stationary and later moved east and disappeared to the east. my friend said they are probably drones and someone is having fun with us which is i guess the most likely explanation but i had never seen anything like this before and the white pulsating light south of seattle was very eerie too. the pulsating light looked far further south than the orange glowing objects, maybe over kent. like i said the pulsating light disappeared eastward and the orange objects disappeared westward, just blinking on and off and then disappearing. it was very weird.
content.summary: Several orange lights moving mainly east to west over downtown seattle, not luminaria

content.detailedDescription:
Walking to move my car at 9;10 pm i looked up and observed an airplane traveling northwest and another airplane traveling east… 
between the two airplanes directly overhead of me was an object traveling from east to west at a high rate of speed. it was 4 lights in a fixed triangle position pointing west and traveling west… 
no sound was observed and no contrails were observed.
the lights were perfect circles and large lights... 
it could have been 4 individual objects but there seemed to be an object they were attached to that was almost translucent or clear… 
the object seemed high but not too high maybe 1000-5000 feet over head… seemed very large due to the size of the lights…
each light seemed to be as large as a whole airplane at that height and a solid soft white. the speed was very fast 5-7 times faster than a plane traveling across the sky... 

at first i almost looked right past the object due to its quiet nature and almost hologram appearance… i have no idea what this object was but it was unlike anything i have ever observed before… 

attached is an image i found online this is exactly what i saw the exact shape even ofset like in the attached image…
note this is not my image!!!
content.summary: Looking straight up i observed 4 lights in a triangle shape traveling west

content.detailedDescription: Heading to work at around 1725,i see a jet like contrail going straight up. as i'm driving it appears it has a white point at the top of it .Get to gas station look up at the sky .It is busting up and disappears. i start  my job a work .I'm out side rounds tonight. around 1705 i'm coming out of an out building then i check the west sky to see if smoke stack light a blinking. than when i see this silver shinning object in the sky about one.O.Clock at the right side if the stack. possible over oakhill area.I call on the radio to my coworker to come and see this thing in the sky .He comes out 90 seconds later and the object is gone. he goes back inside. about 10 minutes later. 3 jets fly by the plant. followed 2 more jets.Going east to west. then about 12 minutes later 2 more jets fly bye. then continue the fly aye .Going west to east then returning east to west this goes on for a bout 2 hours back and fourth. thats what it took for my coworkers to think somthing is not right.
content.summary: Object over work place in daylight hours

content.detailedDescription: We were getting out of our truck near the house..When gina...My spouse...Looked up and gazed for a moment...Then said "look...Jesse" three ufo's in what we realized was triangular position around the big dipper...Soaring...In little spurts and straight up...To the left...Orange-red bright balls of light...It was around 9:30 at night..And we saw about 3 to 5...Either meteors or shooting stars...Within the triangle...We were elated...And we watched them for about a half-hour...Went inside our house...Then came back out...To see them beaming around still...And then the next night around 6...Yes...Today...They are still there...Moving...Jumping a little...Yet pretty much...In formation
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Divine

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were headed east on hwy 12 when noticed 2 seemingly hovering lights above the hill/ridgeway (i say seemingly because we were driving along but it never changed course or direction. it wasn't until we stopped at a light that it started to move towards us and flew overhead headed west. at that point we parked in the safeway parking lot and watched it slowly move away and when it was closer to downtown santa rosa, it changed direction to head south west and sped off very quickly until it disappeared from view. it flew right below the cloud cover and there were no blinking lights that you see on planes/ helicopters at night... there was a lead light and another trailing it and to the left as you looked at it. at first it looked like aa plane landing at night from head on...But it always maintained the same height.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 staggered lights each different color formation seemed to hover then became red and sped off

content.detailedDescription: While watching the sandpiper beacon west webcam from my home on 11-14-14 at approximately 8:46pm cst i observed in approximately the middle of the (black/white) screen at a south west direction a white ball of light much larger than a star falling from the sky straight down at a rapid speed for only a few seconds out over the gulf of mexico and disappearing either into the water or over the horizon. i thought that it could be a meteor but did not really observe a trail.
content.summary: While watching sandpiper beacon west webcam i observed a ball of light dive straight down at a rapid speed and disappearing either into the water or over the horizon in the gulf of mexico

content.detailedDescription: We live in the flight path of the van nuys airport which is subject to all manner of aircraft - small prop - fire planes/helicopters - private jets - classic military/historic aircraft & occasional military jets which make a lot more noise, so we are familiar with the sound of normal air traffic.On the evening of 12/13/2014 the uniquely loud and reverberating sound of rotor blades was heard within our house. over several hours & after multiple occasions hearing the approaching aircraft rotor sound increase and then decrease as it flew over and past the house i looked out side but could see nothing. the fourth and final time i heard the sound of the helicopter / aircraft approaching i went outside immediately to see what aircraft was making all the noise. i exited my home which faces west, looking towards the approaching sound i observed a large helicopter with it's lights blinking on my left moving from south to the north west, within a few seconds the glowing object appeared from the tall trees that line the street on both sides emerged into the open sky to our nw. the helicopter was right behind it. the helicopter had the standard yellow/white running lights & a red blinking light the object it was following/pursuing did not. the object was 100-150 yards ahead of the helicopter. both moved very fast to the nw and as it did the orb/glowing object became less visible & seemed to fade out of sight or was obscured by trees ect. i did not wait to see if it would reappear i wanted to tell my wife what i just saw. the helicopter was about the length of a smashed flat 6 inch subway sandwich at arms length in the sky to give you an idea of scale and distance. the glowing object/orb perhaps the size of a penny-nickle.Im making this statement because as a rational religious and moral person this event struck me as very odd & unique - after digging through many google searches with multiple terminology i was able to find almost identical accounts from others within this last year on the website ufogrid
content.summary: Large helicopter following non blinking bright orb

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the intersection of colville rd and tillicum rd. it was 530pm at night and sun was already down. it was clear night, no notable breeze. saw the orange/red glowing light in the sky to my ne and it traveled s. i heard no sound. i used binoculars to observe the object and could see no shape of wings nor any navigation lights or beacons. lost sight as it went behind trees. i tired moving my location but was unable to reacquire the object.

i had thought it was possibly a chinese flying lantern but victoria airport was reporting the winds were light and northerly and the object was heading south.
content.summary: Orange glowing core with glowing red outer edge

content.detailedDescription: Traveling north on ashburn village blvd. i saw three objects of light moving very fast in random patterns and then there were four then five and they started moving in a circle following each other and then they were gone. unlike anything i have ever seen, moving way too fast through the sky.
content.summary: Three to four lights moving really fast randomly. then there were five moving fast in a circle as is they were chasing each other. super fast!

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on our deck when i spotted an object during the daytime moving extremely fast in nw direction. it was difficult to detail the object but it was about the size of a airliner without any noticeable wings, tail, fuselage, or anything recognizable. it was very bright (either white or reflective metal) and much faster that a aircraft i have seen [we have aircraft fly over the valley all the time and they range from military helicopters, commercial jets, private aircraft, and even balloons from temecula rise high enough for us to see]. it appeared to travel over the horizon in about 3 seconds (red arrow depicts flight path seen). usually it will take several minutes for most aircraft that fly that distance. 
at first i thought an aircraft may have launched a missile because it went so fast, but quickly ruled that out because the area is residential. the more i thought about it the more i felt it couldn't have been any aircraft i was aware of (as an engineer i worked on military aircraft for the navy so i was very familiar with our capabilities-natops). 
i decided to estimate the flight path on google earth. after locating the path of the ufo on google earth i've estimated the distance traveled was little over 3 miles in 3 seconds. the map on the slides shows the path of ufo as red arrow. this converts to approximately 3600 miles per hour! this ufo should have broken the sound barrier. mach 1 is about 1116 ft/sec == 760 miles per hour. this ufo flew greater than 4 times mach 1, without the sonic boom.
note: the green lines in the photos/drawings are vectors used to plot the course.
content.summary: Very fast object 3600 mph

content.detailedDescription: Back when i was living in springfield massachusetts, four of us were in a jeep traveling east on the 20 just crossing the bridge over the connecticut river. the jeep had a soft top with the back door or hatch missing. myself and one other were sitting face-to-face sideways in the back. i was behind the driver. the day was cloudy with only several small places to see the blue sky. i loved the outdoors so i was always checking the sky for the weather and our chance to play golf, baseball, or something. the clouds were maybe 400 feet higher than us. the opening could be considered nearly round and about 50 - 75 feet at it's largest diameter. as we were crossing the bridge i was looking up through one of the openings in the clouds. through the hole i saw part of an object. it appeared to be on the other side of the cloud. at first i thought it might be the front or rear of a deridgable. it was grey in color, dull and smooth. i called attention to the other dude in the back and he looked at it and just stared back at me in bewilderment. i started shouting to the driver to stop the car and pull over. as soon as we got onto the on-ramp for the next freeway we were able to pull over. we all got out of the car and stared at it. by now the clouds had exposed it a little bit more, but nothing could be made out any more than a dull oblong shape. then, the object appeared to be struck by the sun and it glistened like we were looking at the end and bottom of a very shiny, metallic object. there were no seams, windows, wings or anything. a few minutes later the clouds covered it completely.
content.summary: Large dull then shiny object above clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped outside at 0650 hrs to smoke a cigarette, it was still dark outside.  while i was sitting on a small covered front porch i noticed a bright light infront of me to the right. i leaned to my left around the brick pillar to see what was making the light and i saw there was a white glowing huge square shaped object directly across the street.  it looked like it was as bigger then a two story house.  it was stationary over the house across the street.  i quickly switched on my cellular phone camera, i braced my phone up against the right side of the pillar and took two pictures. i switched the camera to video and braced the phone up against the pillar again and proceeded to record for 2 minutes.  i had to stop recording at that point due to needing to leave home to pick up a customer at 0710-0715.  the object/lights was still above the house across the street when i stopped filming. i did not have the opportunity to continue observing it.  

i have the video available but cannot attach to this reporting.  there is a malfunction with my phone when i try to attach the file.   the two still pictures i attached were both taken at 0653, if you increase the font/size you can see the object best.  i would be happy to forward the video in another email.  

my husband and i have been going to the san antonio mufon meetings for the last three years.  i look forward to hearing from you.
content.summary: Bright white square shaped object observed above house across from me. i took 2 pictures, switched to video, recorded 2 minutes.  object was now flashing/blinking red blue violet yellow orange, was a solid circular object.

content.detailedDescription:
Okay so this morning i woke for work at 4:45. i usually warm up my car close to 5.
i just barely opened the car door an i noticed something fly right on top of me from my peripheral vision. i thought is was an owl because i see a lot of them in the mornings. but of course owls don't have three lights. this thing was coming from canada i'm assuming heading south making no noise. but with a speed that no airplane can go at without making noise right!? of course i freaked out an i cursed haha...I ran inside talking mother was i just saw. and i was already running late to work so i went back out side so leave at 5:10 an again another one passed but smaller. this one wasn't a triangle shaped. it looked white an no lights. but with an incredible speed. i'm just just in shock. the third one i saw was way up in the sky. it blended in with the stars but i was able to see it. an i pulled my phone e to record it. and bam! my camera actually caught it. its weird tho. with my eyes it looked like regular star. but in my video it actually brightened the ufos light that it gives off. an it was all perfect timing when i saw the ufos. as if i was meant to see them. i'm still thinking about it. what did i see???
content.summary: I saw 3 ufos this morning... the first one was clearly a triangle shaped!! the second was smaller as if it followed the other ufo 5mins later. an the 3rd one was way up in the sky.
